```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
library(plotly)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
province <- "Istanbul"
raw <- read_csv(paste0(province, "_Kiralik.csv"))
```

## Districts

### Adalar {.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### Rental

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
ilce <- 'adalar'
df <- raw[raw$Province == ilce, ]
df <- df[df$Price>= 500 & df$Price <= 300000,]
df <- df[df$Size>= 30 & df$Size <= 1500,]
fig <- plot_ly(data = df, x = ~Size, y = ~Price)
fig <- fig %>% layout(title = paste0(str_to_title(ilce), " rental prices and house sizes"), xaxis = list(title = 'Size, m²'), yaxis = list(title = 'Price, TRY'))
fig
```
